statements: SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_timeline ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_timeline WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT project_name FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date < '2022-07-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM project_timeline
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timeline WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name FROM project_timeline WHERE end_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_timeline WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-08-01';
SELECT COUNT(project_id) AS total_projects FROM project_timeline;
SELECT * FROM architects;
SELECT name, email FROM architects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE architect_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM projects ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM architects WHERE name = 'John Smith';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE architect_id = 1 ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE deadline > '2022-12-31' AND project_description LIKE '%modern%';
SELECT architect_id, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM projects GROUP BY architect_id HAVING total_projects > 5;
SELECT a.name AS architect_name, p.project_name FROM architects a JOIN projects p ON a.id = p.architect_id WHERE p.deadline < '2023-05-01';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date, status FROM Task;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Team;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Project WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, count(*) as num_tasks FROM Project INNER JOIN Task ON Project.project_id = Task.project_id GROUP BY Project.project_id, project_name;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM Team WHERE project_id = 1001;
SELECT task_name, deadline_date FROM Task WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM Employee WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM Task WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_name, project_name FROM Team JOIN Project ON Team.project_id = Project.project_id;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM Task WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM Employee JOIN Team ON Employee.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE Team.team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(team_id) FROM Team JOIN Project ON Team.project_id = Project.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM ArchitecturalProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ArchitecturalProjects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, status FROM ProjectTasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT first_name, last_name, position FROM Employees WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM ProjectTasks ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArchitecturalProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM ArchitecturalProjects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM ArchitecturalProjects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Employees.first_name, Employees.last_name, ProjectTasks.task_name FROM Employees INNER JOIN ResourceAllocation ON Employees.emp_id = ResourceAllocation.emp_id INNER JOIN ProjectTasks ON ResourceAllocation.task_id = ProjectTasks.task_id;

SELECT project_name, progress_status, description FROM ArchitecturalProjects INNER JOIN ProjectTasks ON ArchitecturalProjects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id INNER JOIN ProjectProgress ON ProjectTasks.task_id = ProjectProgress.task_id ORDER BY project_name ASC;
